title: Textile, ca. 1920
medium:
Medium: wool, cotton
Technique: Woven imitation of wool needlepoint. Brick repeat of rectangular pattern unit.
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 12.8 x 12.7 cm (5 1/16 in. x 5 in.)
description: Length of upholstery fabric with pair of peacocks standing in water (?) under flowering trees of pale and deep blues, peach, ochre, and shades of green on a black background. Knoll with tree and fence part of same repeat. Woven finish at bottom has two Orinoka Mills symbols.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, ca. 1920.Medium: wool, cotton
Technique: Woven imitation of wool needlepoint. Brick repeat of rectangular pattern unit.. 1971-56-3.
